info.title: AODocs REST API
info.description: The AODocs REST API exposes most of the features of AODocs. It can be used to implement custom applications, third-party integration, bulk tools, or just to experiment with AODocs.

tags.name: search
tags.description: Lets you search and count documents

post.description: Searches documents in the whole domain matching the provided query.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The G Suite domain

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: The text searched to filter documents

parameters.name: searchQueryTarget
parameters.description: The scope of the search: 'PROPERTIES_ONLY' to search only in the document metadata, 'ATTACHMENTS_ONLY' to search only in the attachment contents.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The token for continuing a previous list request on the next page. This should be set to the value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous response.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of documents per page. (Default: 20)

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The timezone to use for datetime field searches (default: UTC). Format: 'Europe/Paris' or '+01:00'

parameters.name: securityCode
parameters.description: The security code

post.description: Searches documents in the domain with attachments matching the search query. The document metadata will not be searched using this method.

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: The text searched to filter documents

parameters.name: minimumDocumentNumber
parameters.description: The maximum number of documents per page. (Default: 20)

parameters.name: securityCode
parameters.description: The security code

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The G Suite domain

post.description: Counts documents of a document class. Only accessible to library administrators.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: The ID of the library

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: The ID of the document class

parameters.name: deleteOption
parameters.description: The scope of documents to find: 'DELETED' to get only deleted documents, 'NOT_DELETED' (default value) to get only non-deleted documents or 'ALL' to get all documents

parameters.name: securityCode
parameters.description: The security code

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The G Suite domain

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The timezone to use for datetime field searches (default: UTC). Format: 'Europe/Paris' or '+01:00'

post.description: Lists all documents of a document class. Only accessible to library administrators.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: The ID of the library

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: The ID of the document class

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The token for continuing a previous list request on the next page. This should be set to the value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous response.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of documents per page. (Default: 20)

parameters.name: deleteOption
parameters.description: The scope of documents to find: 'DELETED' to get only deleted documents, 'NOT_DELETED' (default value) to get only non-deleted documents or 'ALL' to get all documents

parameters.name: securityCode
parameters.description: The security code

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The G Suite domain

parameters.name: publishState
parameters.description: The type of documents to find: 'DRAFT_ONLY' to get draft versions only (if access to it), 'PUBLISHED' to get main versions only (if access to it), 'ALL' for both (the draft version if access to it else the main version). The last mode is the default one.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The timezone to use for datetime field searches (default: UTC). Format: 'Europe/Paris' or '+01:00'

post.description: Searches documents of a class matching the provided query. Might become very slow or timeout when iterating over many results pages. If the result set contains more than 10k documents, it's highly likely some results will be missing. You should always check if precision=INCOMPLETE_RESULT in the response.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: The ID of the library

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: The ID of the document class

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: The text searched to filter documents

parameters.name: publishState
parameters.description: The type of documents to find: 'DRAFT_ONLY' to get draft versions only (if access to it), 'PUBLISHED' to get main versions only (if access to it), 'ALL' for both (the draft version if access to it else the main version). The last mode is the default one.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset from which we should get the documents. (Default: 0, i.e. from the first one)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of documents per page. (Default: 20)

parameters.name: searchInAttachments
parameters.description: Whether to search the text in the attachments too (true by default)

parameters.name: securityCode
parameters.description: The security code

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The G Suite domain

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The timezone to use for datetime field searches (default: UTC). Format: 'Europe/Paris' or '+01:00'

post.description: Starts to cache search results asynchronously in a job. Returns the jobId.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: The ID of the library

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: The ID of the document class

parameters.name: viewId
parameters.description: The ID of the view

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: The text searched to filter documents

parameters.name: publishState
parameters.description: The type of documents to find: 'DRAFT_ONLY' to get draft versions only (if access to it), 'PUBLISHED' to get main versions only (if access to it), 'ALL' for both (the draft version if access to it else the main version). The last mode is the default one.

parameters.name: securityCode
parameters.description: The security code

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The G Suite domain

requestBody.description: List of filters to apply to the search.

post.description: Searches documents in a view matching the provided query. Might become very slow or timeout when iterating over many results pages. If the result set contains more than 10k documents, it's highly likely some results will be missing. You should always check if precision=INCOMPLETE_RESULT in the response.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: The ID of the library

parameters.name: viewId
parameters.description: The ID of the view

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset from which we should get the documents. (Default: 0, i.e. from the first one)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of documents per page. (Default: 20)

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: The text searched to filter documents

parameters.name: securityCode
parameters.description: The security code

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The G Suite domain

parameters.name: searchInAttachments
parameters.description: Whether to search the text in the attachments too (true by default)

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The timezone to use for datetime field searches (default: UTC). Format: 'Europe/Paris' or '+01:00'

post.description: Searches documents in a view or a class matching the provided query. If the result set contains more than 10k documents, it's highly likely some results will be missing. You should always check if precision=INCOMPLETE_RESULT in the response.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: The ID of the library

parameters.name: viewId
parameters.description: The ID of the view

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: The ID of the document class

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The token for continuing a previous list request on the next page. This should be set to the value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous response.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of documents per page. (Default: 20)

parameters.name: securityCode
parameters.description: The security code

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The G Suite domain

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The timezone to use for datetime field searches (default: UTC). Format: 'Europe/Paris' or '+01:00'

fileId.description: The ID the file in Drive

iconLink.description: The URL of the icon of the file

link.description: The URL to the file in Drive (read-only)

mimeType.description: The MIME type of the file

permissionsOnDrive.description: The list of permissions set in Drive for the file

publishedLink.description: The URL of the file when published

resourceKey.description: A file that is shared with the link may only be discovered with this resourceKey

revisionId.description: The ID of the revision of the file in Drive

size.description: The size (in octet) of the file

storageLocation.description: The storage location of the file. Possible values are 'DRIVE' and 'OSS' (read-only)

id.description: The ID the file as used on the storage type

mimeType.description: The MIME type of the file

size.description: The size (in octet) of the file

storageType.description: Where is the file stored? Either DRIVE (Google Drive), or OSS (AODocs Object Storage System)

name.description: The displayed name of the user

nonGoogle.description: This user is not a google user

thumbnailPictureUrl.description: The URL of the thumbnail picture of the user

error.description: Indicates whether the evaluation of the setting terminated on error (read-only)

errorMessage.description: If the evaluation terminated on error, indicates the error message (read-only)

calculatedSettingsInfo.description: Information about the result of evaluation of calculated settings (read-only)

description_i18n.description: The internationalized description of the field (read-only)

editable.description: Whether the field is editable by the current user

fieldName_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the field (read-only)

hidden.description: Whether the field is hidden to the user user

multiple.description: Whether there can be multiple values

placeholderText.description: The help text to display in the field input (read-only)

rank.description: The rank at which the field is displayed in the document page (read-only)

readOnly.description: Whether the field is currently read-only

type.description: The field type (STRING, DATE, ..., CATEGORY, REFERENCE_CATALOG)

dynamicValues.description: Whether the category authorizes dynamic values

folder.description: Whether the category is the Folder category (read-only)

levelNames.description: The name of the levels in the category

levelNames_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the levels in the category (read-only field)

tags.description: Whether the category is the Tags category (read-only)

value.description: The ID of the category (backward compatibility for category.category.listCategoryDefinitions)

ancestors.description: Ancestor category values from direct parent to root - only present with loadCategoryValue

id.description: The ID of the category value

leaf.description: Whether the category value is leaf

leafInNotOutdatedTree.description: Whether the category value is leaf without not outdated child

name.description: The name of the category value

name_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the category value (read-only field)

outdated.description: Whether the category value is marked as outdated

parentId.description: The ID of the parent category value (read-only field)

shortName.description: The short name of the category value

value.description: (Deprecated) The ID of the category value

attachmentsToCopy.description: The list of attachments to copy (for create/patch)

categories.description: The list of category fields (only the values are editable)

checkOutBy.description: The email of the user who checked-out the document (read-only field)

checkoutDate.description: The time at which the document was checked-out (read-only field)

classId.description: The ID of the class of the document (read-only field)

className.description: The name of the class of the document (read-only field)

className_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the class of the document (read-only field)

coordinate.description: The coordinate of the sequence for the document (<librarySequenceId>.<documentClassSequenceId>.<documentSequenceId>[.<versionSequenceId>]) (read-only field)

creationDate.description: The time at which the document was created (read-only field)

deleteAuthor.description: The email of the user who deleted the document (read-only field)

deleted.description: Whether the document is deleted (read-only field)

deletedReason.description: The reason for deleting the document (read-only field)

deletionDate.description: The time at which the document was deleted (read-only field)

domainName.description: The name of the domain (read-only field)

driveOnlyPermissions.description: The list of additional permissions configured in Secured Folder libraries

editable.description: Whether the current user can edit the document (read-only field)

evaluationError.description: Whether there is an evaluation error on at least one field of the document (read-only field)

fields.description: The list of native fields (values and metadata are editable)

folders.description: The location of the document (folder path as list of folders)

forbiddenOperations.description: The map of the forbidden operations to the current user and the reasons why they are forbidden (read-only field)

fullSizeOfAttachments.description: The summed size (in octet) of the attachments (read-only field)

iconLink.description: The link to the icon relative to the attachment (read-only field)

id.description: The ID of the document (read-only field)

incomplete.description: Whether there are missing mandatory fields on the document (read-only field)

initialAuthor.description: The email of the user who created the document (read-only field)

invalidValues.description: Whether there are invalid values for fields of the document (read-only field)

libraryId.description: The ID of the library (read-only field)

libraryName.description: The name of the library (read-only field)

modificationDate.description: The time at which the document was last modified (read-only field after document creation)

numberOfAttachments.description: The number of attachments in the document (read-only field)

onlyAdminCanChangeAcl.description: Whether only administrators can modify the permissions of the document

onlyAdminCanDelete.description: Whether only administrators can be delete the document

originalVersionId.description: Id of the original version if this version was created by restoring a previous version, otherwise null

permissions.description: The list of permissions relative to the document

permittedOperations.description: The list of permitted operations to the current user (read-only field)

publishedLink.description: The link of the publication for mono-attachment documents

publishedMode.description: The publication mode (NONE, DOMAIN, EVERYONE) for mono-attachment documents

referenceCatalogs.description: The list of reference catalog fields (only the values are editable)

relatedDocuments.description: The map of related documents per relation

restrictedDownload.description: Whether the flag controlling whether reader users can download, copy or print the document is enabled.

sections.description: The sections in which fields are organized (read-only field)

sequenceId.description: The sequence ID of the document (read-only field)

setModifiedDate.description: Whether to set the date of last modification

state.description: The name of the workflow state (read-only field)

stateChangeAuthors.description: The person(s) who were involved in the last workflow state change (read-only field)

stateChangeDate.description: The date at which the document last changed of workflow state (read-only field)

stateId.description: The ID of the workflow state

state_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the workflow state (read-only field)

systemFields.description: The list of system fields (only the values are editable)

tableFields.description: The list of table fields (only the values are editable)

updateAuthor.description: The email of the user who last modified the document (read-only field)

userCanChangeAcl.description: Whether the current user can modify the permissions (read-only field)

userCanChangeProperties.description: Whether the current user can modify the properties (read-only field)

userCanDelete.description: Whether the current user can delete the document (read-only field)

userMapping.description: The mapping between user email and user profile (read-only field)

versionCreated.description: The time at which the version was created (read-only field)

versionCreator.description: The email of the user who created the version (read-only field)

versionDescription.description: The description of the current version of the document

versionId.description: The ID of the version (read-only field)

versionLabel.description: (Deprecated) The description of the version (replaced by versionDescription)

versionName.description: The name of the current version of the document

versionNumber.description: (Deprecated) The number of the version (replaced by versionName)

workflowId.description: The ID of the workflow related to the class of the document (read-only field)

defaultTabToDisplay.description: The tab to display when open the document

orientation.description: The orientation to display the document (PORTRAIT or LANDSCAPE)

visibleRelations.description: The list of ordered relations to display in the Relations section

visibleSections.description: The list of ordered sections to display

iconLink.description: The URL of the icon of the file

link.description: The URL to the file in Drive

permissionsOnDrive.description: The list of permissions set in Drive for the file

publishedLink.description: The URL of the file when published

resourceKey.description: A file that is shared with the link may only be discovered with this resourceKey

revisionId.description: The ID of the revision of the file in Drive

additionalRoles.description: The additional roles for the permission like COMMENTER

allowlisted.description: Whether the email address is allowlisted (individually or via its domain) in the current domain

belongsToDomain.description: Whether the email address is part of the current domain

email.description: The email of the permission or the domain name if type = DOMAIN

googleEmailAddress.description: Whether the email address is tied to a Google account

name.description: The displayed name for the permission

permissionId.description: The unique ID for the permission in Drive

role.description: The role of the permission: READER, WRITER, OWNER

thumbnailPhotoUrl.description: The URL of the thumbnail picture of the permitted user or group

type.description: The type of permission in Drive: ANYONE, DOMAIN, GROUP, USER

withLink.description: Whether the permission imposes to have the link to access (vs. can be searched for)

calculatedSettingsInfo.description: Information about the result of evaluation of calculated settings (read-only)

description_i18n.description: The internationalized description of the field (read-only)

editable.description: Whether the field is editable by the current user

fieldName_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the field (read-only)

hidden.description: Whether the field is hidden to the user user

multiple.description: Whether there can be multiple values

placeholderText.description: The help text to display in the field input (read-only)

rank.description: The rank at which the field is displayed in the document page (read-only)

readOnly.description: Whether the field is currently read-only

type.description: The field type (STRING, DATE, ..., CATEGORY, REFERENCE_CATALOG)

values.description: The list of values for the field

type.description: The type of the field (read-only field)

columnCount.description: The number of columns to display fields for this section.

fields.description: The list of fields in the section

id.description: The ID of the section (read-only field)

name_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the section (read-only field)

errorMessage.description: The error message if the value inputted is not valid

lowerLimit.description: The lower limit of the range for numerical fields

lowerLimitInclusive.description: Whether to include the lower limit value in the range

mandatoryLeaf.description: Whether the leaf selection is required for Category or Reference Catalog fields

regex.description: The regular expression for String fields

upperLimit.description: The upper limit of the range for numerical fields

upperLimitInclusive.description: Whether to include the upper limit value in the range

error.description: If the field has no value, indicates whether this is due to an evaluation error (read-only)

editable.description: Whether the folder is editable by the current user (read-only field)

editableDocuments.description: Whether the documents in the folder are editable by the current user (read-only field)

fileId.description: The ID of the folder in Drive

folderAodocsId.description: The ID of the folder in AODocs model (0 if root folder)

folderDefinitionId.description: (Deprecated) The ID of the folder configuration

folderIsRoot.description: Whether the folder is the root folder (read-only field)

parentFolderAodocsId.description: The ID of the parent folder in AODocs model (0 if root folder)

parentFolderDriveId.description: The ID of the parent folder in Drive

parentFolderIsRoot.description: Whether the parent folder is the root folder (read-only field)

permittedOperations.description: The list of permitted operations to the current user (read-only field)

resourceKey.description: A folder that is shared with the link may only be discovered with this resourceKey

restrictedDownload.description: Whether the documents in the folder are marked as restricted to download, copy and print (for the readers)

downloadLink.description: The URL to download the OSS file

createdAt.description: The timestamp (in ms) at which the catalog was created (read-only field)

id.description: The ID of the reference catalog (read-only field)

levelNames.description: Ordered name of levels of the reference catalog

modifiedAt.description: The timestamp (in ms) at which the catalog was last modified (read-only field)

name.description: The name of the reference catalog

numberOfValues.description: The number of values in the reference catalog (read-only field)

calculatedSettingsInfo.description: Information about the result of evaluation of calculated settings (read-only)

description_i18n.description: The internationalized description of the field (read-only)

editable.description: Whether the field is editable by the current user

fieldName_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the field (read-only)

hidden.description: Whether the field is hidden to the user user

multiple.description: Whether there can be multiple values

placeholderText.description: The help text to display in the field input (read-only)

rank.description: The rank at which the field is displayed in the document page (read-only)

readOnly.description: Whether the field is currently read-only

referenceCatalogId.description: The ID of the reference catalog

type.description: The field type (STRING, DATE, ..., CATEGORY, REFERENCE_CATALOG)

values.description: The list of reference catalog values

customFromTitles.description: The corresponding custom title (if relation renderer enabled) for the related documents on FROM side (read-only field)

customToTitles.description: The corresponding custom title (if relation renderer enabled) for the related documents on TO side (read-only field)

from.description: The list of related documents on FROM side

to.description: The list of related documents on TO side

allOf.description: Must match ALL of these filters (mutually exclusive with anyOf and property/operator/(values)).

anyOf.description: Must match ANY of these filters (mutually exclusive with allOf and property/operator/(values)).

operator.description: Operator to be applied on the given property (mutually exclusive with anyOf and allOf).

property.description: Property on which to apply the operator (mutually exclusive with anyOf and allOf).

values.description: Values associated to the operator (mutually exclusive with anyOf and allOf, the expected number of values depends on the operator).

disableSorting.description: Enforce the fact that results won't be sorted because by default results are sorted by last modification date

sort.description: Order the results of the search

classId.description: The ID of the class when type = FIELD

className.description: The name of the class when type = FIELD

description.description: The description for type in GROUP, ROLE, FIELD

displayName.description: The display name of the user or group, the name of the role (read-only field)

displayName_i18n.description: The display name of the user or group, the internationalized name of the role (read-only field)

thumbnailPictureUrl.description: The URL of the thumbnail picture (especially for users)

type.description: The type of person (user, group, role, field based, domain i.e. everybody)

value.description: The email address if user or group, the ID of the role, the ID of the class/field (ignored if type = DOMAIN)

displayName.description: The internationalized name of the field

editable.description: Whether the field is editable by the current user

hidden.description: Whether the field is hidden to the current user

id.description: The ID of the system field

readOnly.description: Whether the field is currently read-only

calculatedSettingsInfo.description: Information about the result of evaluation of calculated settings (read-only)

description_i18n.description: The internationalized description of the field (read-only)

editable.description: Whether the field is editable by the current user

fieldName_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the field (read-only)

hidden.description: Whether the field is hidden to the user user

multiple.description: Whether there can be multiple values

placeholderText.description: The help text to display in the field input (read-only)

rank.description: The rank at which the field is displayed in the document page (read-only)

readOnly.description: Whether the field is currently read-only

type.description: The field type (STRING, DATE, ..., CATEGORY, REFERENCE_CATALOG)

calculatedSettingsInfo.description: Information about the result of evaluation of calculated settings (read-only)

columns.description: The columns definition of the table (read-only)

description_i18n.description: The internationalized description of the field (read-only)

editable.description: Whether the field is editable by the current user

fieldName_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the field (read-only)

hidden.description: Whether the field is hidden to the user user

multiple.description: Whether there can be multiple values

placeholderText.description: The help text to display in the field input (read-only)

rank.description: The rank at which the field is displayed in the document page (read-only)

readOnly.description: Whether the field is currently read-only

type.description: The field type (STRING, DATE, ..., CATEGORY, REFERENCE_CATALOG)

values.description: The values (organized as rows) contained in the table

rowId.description: Unique id of the current row

classId_query_parameter.name: classId
classId_query_parameter.description: The ID of the document class

deleteOption_query_parameter.name: deleteOption
deleteOption_query_parameter.description: The scope of documents to find: 'DELETED' to get only deleted documents, 'NOT_DELETED' (default value) to get only non-deleted documents or 'ALL' to get all documents

limit_query_parameter.name: limit
limit_query_parameter.description: The maximum number of documents per page. (Default: 20)

offset_query_parameter.name: offset
offset_query_parameter.description: The offset from which we should get the documents. (Default: 0, i.e. from the first one)

pageToken_query_parameter.name: pageToken
pageToken_query_parameter.description: The token for continuing a previous list request on the next page. This should be set to the value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous response.

publishState_query_parameter.name: publishState
publishState_query_parameter.description: The type of documents to find: 'DRAFT_ONLY' to get draft versions only (if access to it), 'PUBLISHED' to get main versions only (if access to it), 'ALL' for both (the draft version if access to it else the main version). The last mode is the default one.

searchInAttachments_query_parameter.name: searchInAttachments
searchInAttachments_query_parameter.description: Whether to search the text in the attachments too (true by default)

searchQuery_query_parameter.name: searchQuery
searchQuery_query_parameter.description: The text searched to filter documents

timezone_query_parameter.name: timezone
timezone_query_parameter.description: The timezone to use for datetime field searches (default: UTC). Format: 'Europe/Paris' or '+01:00'
